languages.text: Сплетни о гниющих останках эльдарского мира-корабля разлетелись по Простору. Эксплораторы, каперы, агенты Касбаллики и искатели наживы бросились к пограничным системам, дабы урвать лакомый кусочек. Часть из них пожрал варп, другие погибли в стычках друг с другом. Самые умелые и удачливые вернулись спустя десятилетия поисков с пустыми руками. Титанический корабль размером с имперский мир словно бы никогда и не существовал, но легенда о запретном сокровище продолжала жить и губить все новых смельчаков.

Rumours of the rotting remains of an Aeldari craftworld spread around the Expanse. Explorators, privateers, Kasballica agents, and anyone hungry for easy money all rushed to frontier systems to vie for a piece of the prize. Some were swallowed by the warp, while others perished in skirmishes with their rivals. The most skilled and fortunate returned empty-handed after decades of searching. The colossal ship, as big as an Imperial world, simply vanished, as if it had never existed. But the legend of the forbidden treasure lived on and continued to bring daring souls to ruin.
languages.original_text: Сплетни о гниющих останках эльдарского мира-корабля разлетелись по Простору. Эксплораторы, каперы, агенты Касбаллики и искатели наживы бросились к пограничным системам, дабы урвать лакомый кусочек. Часть из них пожрал варп, другие погибли в стычках друг с другом. Самые умелые и удачливые вернулись спустя десятилетия поисков с пустыми руками. Титанический корабль размером с имперский мир словно бы никогда и не существовал, но легенда о запретном сокровище продолжала жить и губить все новых смельчаков.

traits.locale_text: Rumours of rotting remains of Aeldari craftworld travelled around the Expanse. Explorators, privateers, Kasballica agents, and those hungry for easy money, all rushed to border systems, all wanting to nip a piece of the cake. Some got swallowed by warp, others killed each other. The most skilled and fortunate returned after decades of search empty-handed. The colossal ship, as big, as an Imperial World, vanished as if it never existed. Yet the legend of forbidden treasure lived on and brought to ruin more new daring souls.

Rumours of rotting remains of Aeldari craftworld travelled around the Expanse. Explorators, privateers, Kasballica agents, and those hungry for easy money, all rushed to border systems, all wanting to nip a piece of the cake. Some got swallowed by warp, others killed each other. The most skilled and fortunate returned after decades of search empty-handed. The colossal ship, as big, as an Imperial World, vanished as if it never existed. Yet the legend of forbidden treasure lived on and brought to ruin more new daring souls.

Rumours of the rotting remains of an Aeldari craftworld travelled around the Expanse. Explorators, privateers, Kasballica agents, and anyone hungry for easy money all rushed to frontier systems to vie for a piece of the prize. Some were swallowed by the warp, others clashed and perished in ruthless skirmishes. The most skilled and fortunate returned empty-handed after decades of searching. The colossal ship, as big as an Imperial World, simply vanished, as if it had never existed. But the legend of forbidden treasure lived on and brought more daring souls to ruin.

Explorators, privateers, Kasballica agents, and anyone hungry for easy money all rushed to frontier systems to vie for a piece of the prize. Some were swallowed by the warp, others clashed and perished in ruthless skirmishes. The most skilled and fortunate returned empty-handed after decades of searching. The colossal ship, as big as an Imperial World, simply vanished, as if it had never existed. But the legend of forbidden treasure lived on and brought more daring souls to ruin.

Explorators, privateers, Kasballica agents, and anyone hungry for easy money all rushed to frontier systems to vie for a piece of the prize. Some were swallowed by the warp, while others perished in skirmishes with their rivals. The most skilled and fortunate returned empty-handed after decades of searching. The colossal ship, as big as an Imperial world, simply vanished, as if it had never existed. But the legend of the forbidden treasure lived on and continued to bring daring souls to ruin.

Rumours of the rotting remains of an Aeldari craftworld spread around the Expanse. Explorators, privateers, Kasballica agents, and anyone hungry for easy money all rushed to frontier systems to vie for a piece of the prize. Some were swallowed by the warp, while others perished in skirmishes with their rivals. The most skilled and fortunate returned empty-handed after decades of searching. The colossal ship, as big as an Imperial world, simply vanished, as if it had never existed. But the legend of the forbidden treasure lived on and continued to bring daring souls to ruin.

languages.text: 关于艾达灵族方舟世界残骸的流言传遍了科罗努斯扩区。开拓者、私掠者、卡斯巴利卡特工，以及其他所有想要赚点快钱的人，都涌向了边缘星系，打算分一杯羹。他们之中一部分人被亚空间吞噬，而另一部分人则在无情的小规模冲突中丧生。几十年的探寻过去了，而即使是最老练、最幸运的人也只能空手而归。这艘如同帝国世界一般大小的巨船就这样消失了，就好像它从来没有存在过一样，但关于禁忌宝藏的传说却流传了下来，引诱更多勇敢的灵魂走向毁灭。
languages.original_text: Rumours of the rotting remains of an Aeldari craftworld spread around the Expanse. Explorators, privateers, Kasballica agents, and anyone hungry for easy money all rushed to frontier systems to vie for a piece of the prize. Some were swallowed by the warp, while others perished in skirmishes with their rivals. The most skilled and fortunate returned empty-handed after decades of searching. The colossal ship, as big as an Imperial world, simply vanished, as if it had never existed. But the legend of the forbidden treasure lived on and continued to bring daring souls to ruin.

traits.locale_text: 关于艾达灵族方舟世界残骸的流言传遍了科罗努斯扩区。开拓者、私掠者、卡斯巴利卡特工，以及其他所有想要赚点快钱的人，都涌向了边缘星系，打算分一杯羹。他们之中一部分人被亚空间吞噬，而另一部分人则在无情的小规模冲突中丧生。几十年的探寻过去了，而即使是最老练、最幸运的人也只能空手而归。这艘如同帝国世界一般大小的巨船就这样消失了，就好像它从来没有存在过一样，但关于禁忌宝藏的传说却流传了下来，引诱更多勇敢的灵魂走向毁灭。

languages.text: Gerüchte von den verrottenden Überresten eines Aeldari-Weltenschiffs machten in der Ausdehnung die Runde. Exploratoren, Freibeuter, Kasballica-Agenten und jeder, der gierig nach schnellem Geld war, stürmten in die Grenzsysteme, um einen Stück vom Kuchen abzubekommen. Einige wurden vom Warp verschlungen, andere starben in gnadenlosen Scharmützeln mit ihren Rivalen. Die Fähigsten und Glücklichsten kehrten nach jahrzehntelanger Suche mit leeren Händen zurück. Das kolossale Schiff, so groß wie eine imperiale Welt, verschwand einfach spurlos, als habe es nie existiert. Doch die Legende von verbotenen Schätzen überdauerte und führte noch viele verwegene Seelen in den Ruin.
languages.original_text: Rumours of the rotting remains of an Aeldari craftworld spread around the Expanse. Explorators, privateers, Kasballica agents, and anyone hungry for easy money all rushed to frontier systems to vie for a piece of the prize. Some were swallowed by the warp, while others perished in skirmishes with their rivals. The most skilled and fortunate returned empty-handed after decades of searching. The colossal ship, as big as an Imperial world, simply vanished, as if it had never existed. But the legend of the forbidden treasure lived on and continued to bring daring souls to ruin.

traits.locale_text: Gerüchte von den verrottenden Überresten eines Aeldari-Weltenschiffs machten in der Ausdehnung die Runde. Exploratoren, Freibeuter, Kasballica-Agenten und jeder, der gierig nach schnellem Geld war, stürmten in die Grenzsysteme, um einen Stück vom Kuchen abzubekommen. Einige wurden vom Warp verschlungen, andere brachten sich gegenseitig in gnadenlosen Scharmützeln um. Die Fähigsten und Glücklichsten kehrten nach jahrzehntelanger Suche mit leeren Händen zurück. Das kolossale Schiff, so groß wie eine imperialen Welt, verschwand einfach spurlos, als habe es nie existiert. Doch die Legende von verbotenen Schätzen überdauerte und führte noch viele verwegene Seelen in den Ruin.

languages.text: Des rumeurs sur les restes pourrissants d'un vaisseau-monde aeldari se répandirent à travers les Étendues. Explorateurs, corsaires, agents de la Kasballica et quiconque souhaitant se faire de l'argent facile se précipitèrent dans les systèmes frontaliers pour se tailler une part de la carcasse. Certains furent avalés par le Warp, tandis que d'autres périrent lors d'escarmouches avec leurs rivaux. Les plus habiles et les plus chanceux revinrent vivants, mais bredouilles après des décennies de recherches. Le vaisseau colossal, aussi vaste qu'un monde impérial, s'était volatilisé, comme s'il n'avait jamais existé. Tenace, la rumeur d'un trésor interdit continua néanmoins de mener de nombreuses âmes audacieuses à leur perte.
languages.original_text: Rumours of the rotting remains of an Aeldari craftworld spread around the Expanse. Explorators, privateers, Kasballica agents, and anyone hungry for easy money all rushed to frontier systems to vie for a piece of the prize. Some were swallowed by the warp, while others perished in skirmishes with their rivals. The most skilled and fortunate returned empty-handed after decades of searching. The colossal ship, as big as an Imperial world, simply vanished, as if it had never existed. But the legend of the forbidden treasure lived on and continued to bring daring souls to ruin.

traits.locale_text: Des rumeurs sur les restes pourrissants d'un vaisseau-monde aeldari parcoururent les Étendues. Des explorateurs, des corsaires, des agents de la Kasballica et quiconque souhaitant se faire de l’argent facile se précipitèrent dans les systèmes frontaliers pour se tailler une part de la carcasse. Certains furent avalés par le Warp, tandis que d'autres périrent dans d'impitoyables escarmouches. Les plus habiles et les plus chanceux revinrent vivants, mais bredouilles après des décennies de recherches. Le colossal vaisseau, aussi vaste qu'un monde impérial, s’était volatilisé, comme s'il n'avait jamais existé. Tenace, la rumeur d'un trésor interdit mena néanmoins de nombreuses âmes audacieuses à leur perte.

languages.text: Los rumores de los restos putrefactos de un mundo astronave Aeldari se extendieron por la Extensión. Exploradores, corsarios, agentes de la Kasballica y todos cuantos buscaban dinero fácil se lanzaron a los sistemas fronterizos para luchar por su pedazo del botín. Algunos acabaron devorados por la disformidad, mientras que otros cayeron presa de los enfrentamientos con sus rivales. Los más capacitados y afortunados volvieron con las manos vacías después de décadas de búsqueda. La colosal nave, tan grande como un mundo imperial, se había desvanecido como si nunca hubiera existido. Aun así, la leyenda del tesoro prohibido nunca se olvidó y siguió atrayendo a muchos valientes más a la ruina.
languages.original_text: Rumours of the rotting remains of an Aeldari craftworld spread around the Expanse. Explorators, privateers, Kasballica agents, and anyone hungry for easy money all rushed to frontier systems to vie for a piece of the prize. Some were swallowed by the warp, while others perished in skirmishes with their rivals. The most skilled and fortunate returned empty-handed after decades of searching. The colossal ship, as big as an Imperial world, simply vanished, as if it had never existed. But the legend of the forbidden treasure lived on and continued to bring daring souls to ruin.

traits.locale_text: Los rumores de los restos putrefactos de un mundo astronave Aeldari recorrieron la Extensión. Exploradores, corsarios, agentes de la Kasballica y todos cuantos buscaban dinero fácil se lanzaron a los sistemas fronterizos para luchar por su pedazo del botín. Los más capacitados y afortunados volvieron con las manos vacías después de décadas de búsqueda. La colosal nave, tan grande como un mundo imperial, se había desvanecido como si nunca hubiera existido. Aun así, la leyenda del tesoro prohibido nunca se olvidó y condujo a muchos valientes más a la ruina.

languages.text: アエルダリの方舟が朽ち果てたという噂がエクスパンス中を広まった。探検家、私掠船、カスバリカの諜報員、安易な金儲けに飢えていた者たちは皆、辺境星系に殺到し、賞金の一部を奪い合った。ある者は<歪み>に飲み込まれ、またある者はライバルとの小競り合いで命を落とした。最も熟練した幸運な者たちでさえも、何十年も探した末に手ぶらで帰ってきた。インペリアルワールドほどもある巨大な船は、まるで存在しなかったかのように、ただ消え去った。しかし、禁断の財宝の伝説は生き続け、大胆な冒険者たちを破滅に導き続けた。
languages.original_text: Rumours of the rotting remains of an Aeldari craftworld spread around the Expanse. Explorators, privateers, Kasballica agents, and anyone hungry for easy money all rushed to frontier systems to vie for a piece of the prize. Some were swallowed by the warp, while others perished in skirmishes with their rivals. The most skilled and fortunate returned empty-handed after decades of searching. The colossal ship, as big as an Imperial world, simply vanished, as if it had never existed. But the legend of the forbidden treasure lived on and continued to bring daring souls to ruin.

traits.locale_text: アエルダリの方舟が朽ち果てたという噂がエクスパンス中を駆け巡った。探検家、私掠船、カスバリカの諜報員、安易な金儲けに飢えていた者たちは皆、辺境星系に殺到し、賞金の一部を奪い合った。ある者は<歪み>に飲み込まれ、またある者は冷酷な小競り合いで衝突し、命を落とした。最も熟練した幸運な者たちは、何十年も探した末に手ぶらで帰ってきた。インペリアルワールドほどもある巨大な船は、まるで存在しなかったかのように、ただ消え去った。しかし、禁断の財宝の伝説は生き続け、より大胆な冒険者たちを破滅に導いた。

languages.text: Aeldari gemidünyasının çürümüş kalıntılarıyla ilgili söylentiler, Enginlik'in dört bir yanına yayıldı. Keşiftörler, korsanlar, Kasballica ajanları ve kolay para kazanma arzusundaki herkes; sınır sistemlere akın ederek ganimetten bir parça almaya çalıştı. Bazıları öteboyut tarafından yutuldu, bazıları rakipleriyle girdikleri çatışmalarda yok oldu. En yetenekli ve en talihli olanlar bile on yıllarca süren arayışa rağmen eli boş döndü. Bir İmparatorluk dünyası kadar büyük olan gemi, sanki hiç var olmamışçasına yok oluvermişti. Ancak içinde barındırdığı yasaklı hazinelere dair efsaneler yaşamaya ve nice cüretkâr maceracının sonunu getirmeye devam etti.
languages.original_text: Rumours of the rotting remains of an Aeldari craftworld spread around the Expanse. Explorators, privateers, Kasballica agents, and anyone hungry for easy money all rushed to frontier systems to vie for a piece of the prize. Some were swallowed by the warp, while others perished in skirmishes with their rivals. The most skilled and fortunate returned empty-handed after decades of searching. The colossal ship, as big as an Imperial world, simply vanished, as if it had never existed. But the legend of the forbidden treasure lived on and continued to bring daring souls to ruin.

traits.locale_text: Aeldari gemidünyasının çürümüş kalıntılarına dair söylentiler Enginlik boyunca yayıldı. Keşiftörler, korsanlar, Kasballica ajanları ve kolay para kazanma arzusundaki herkes sınır sistemlere akın ederek ganimetten bir parça almaya çalıştılar. Bazıları öteboyut tarafından yutuldu, bazıları rakipleriyle girdikleri çatışmalarda yok oldu. En yetenekli ve en talihli olanlar bile on yıllarca araştırmalarına rağmen geri eli boş döndüler. Bir İmparatorluk dünyası kadar devasa olan gemi, sanki hiç var olmamışcasına yok oluvermişti. Ancak içinde barındırdığı yasaklı hazinelere dair efsaneler yaşamaya ve nice cüretkâr maceracının sonunu getirmeye devam etti.
